channel.title: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tsukuyomi Ascendant" - How long do I keep my Rolling Successes?

item.title: Re: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded:
Okay, the party house was exceptionally generous with it's stamina today, so I tried it out. The answer to 'Do I have to redo the Rolling Mission?' isâ€¦

Yes.

And no.

You keep all your successes, except your final strike. Apparently since you abandoned the mission, those last successes don't get saved.

Still much better than I feared though. Nice to know I only wasted 30 stamina instead of 450.

item.title: Re: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded: I don't think you'll have to do the rolling challenge again. After all, every time you partially complete a rolling challenge, you can go do other missions and your progress is saved. But I haven't tested this theory here.

item.title: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded: So I do Tsukuyomi Ascendant's rolling mission part, and then I get to the end and I don't have a full moon. If I quit Tsukuyomi Ascendant, do I have to redo the rolling mission.?
